```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
WHO <- read_csv("WHO.csv")
View(WHO)
```
```{r}
str(WHO)
```
```{r}
mean_over60 <- mean(WHO$Over60, na.rm = TRUE)
print(mean_over60)
```

```{r}
# Assuming WHO is the name of your dataset
# Calculate percentage over 60 for each country
WHO <- mutate(WHO, PercentOver60 = (Over60 / Population) * 100)

# Find the country with the smallest percentage over 60
country_smallest_percent_over_60 <- WHO[which.min(WHO$PercentOver60), "Country"]
country_smallest_percent_over_60
```
